name: BriteCap Financial
desc: BriteCap Financial (formerly ForwardLine Financial, est. 2003) is a technology-enabled non-bank SMB lender majority-owned by an affiliate of North Mill Equipment Finance (NMEF/InterVest Capital Partners). Headquartered with offices in North Hollywood, CA and Las Vegas, NV, BriteCap surpassed $1 billion in total originations in December 2025, delivering 55% YoY growth — the strongest year in company history. The company secured a $150M receivable financing facility from One William Street Capital Management in 2024 and launched BriteLine, a revolving line of credit product, in May 2025. Under CEO Richard Henderson (appointed Sep 2024), BriteCap has invested heavily in underwriting intelligence, data-driven technology, and partner enablement, positioning for continued expansion into 2026.

news.h: BriteCap Financial Surpasses $1 Billion in Total Originations
news.d: BriteCap crossed the $1B origination milestone in Dec 2025, delivering 55% YoY growth. CEO Henderson credited disciplined execution, strong partnerships, and investment in underwriting intelligence.

news.h: BriteCap Launches BriteLine for On-Demand Business Capital
news.d: BriteCap launched BriteLine, a next-gen revolving line of credit giving SMB owners on-demand access to capital drawn only when needed based on business performance.

news.h: BriteCap Promotes Coleman to CAO & General Counsel
news.d: Molly Coleman promoted to Chief Administrative Officer & General Counsel after 14+ years at BriteCap, overseeing Legal, Compliance, HR, and BPO strategy.

news.h: BriteCap Financial Expands Team to Support Growth
news.d: BriteCap added three key hires: Director of Collections, Senior Accountant, and Digital Brand Manager to support continued scaling after securing $150M credit facility.
Established a new receivable financing facility from One William Street Capital Management providing up to $150M over a three-year revolving period.

news.h: BriteCap Financial Announces New CEO Richard Henderson
news.d: Richard Henderson appointed CEO, bringing 23+ years of equipment finance and SMB lending experience from CAN Capital, Marlin Capital, and Direct Capital.

news.h: BriteCap Ramps Up Team, Ready For Growth
news.d: Henderson discussed selective broker onboarding strategy and bullish economic outlook. Added CCO Dave Lafferty and CFO Pushkar Choudhuri to leadership team.

leaders.bg: 23+ years in equipment leasing, finance, and SMB lending. Appointed BriteCap CEO Sep 2024. Previously CRO at CAN Capital, Head of Direct Originations & Franchise Finance at Marlin Capital Solutions (2017-2020) where he pioneered the Franchise Finance business achieving asset losses under 0.5%. SVP Franchise & Hospitality Finance at Direct Capital (2013-2015) where he launched LendEdge digital lending platform. President of EquipmentEngine (online auction platform). Saint Anselm College (BA Sociology, Business & Human Relations). Studied at MIT. Lean Six Sigma certified. Based in Portsmouth, NH. Personal interests include philosophy, theoretical physics, and theology.
